title: 107_hr5126
content: Free Housing Market Enhancement Act - Prohibits providing Federal funds to the Federal National Mortgage Association , the Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation , or any Federal Home Loan bank Amends the Federal National Mortgage Association Charter Act and the Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation Act to repeal: (1) the State tax exemption, (2) the requirement that the Treasury approve debt issues, (3) Treasury authority to purchase Fannie MaeFreddie Mac obligations, (4) depositary authority. And (5) the designation of obligations as lawful investments. Amends the Federal Home Loan Bank Act to repeal: (1) the State tax exemption, (2) Treasury authority to purchase bank obligations, (3) depositary authority. And (4) the designation of obligations as lawful investments. Amends the Federal Reserve Act to prohibit Federal Reserve purchase of GSE debt. Repeals the eligibility of GSE obligations for unlimited investment by national banks, federally chartered thrifts, and credit unions.
